request: Adjust existing user stories based on the coding guide provided
action: Completed comprehensive review and update of all 12 existing stories. Updated technical notes, acceptance criteria, and priorities to align with coding guide. Created 2 new stories for MCP support. Identified conflicts with stories 007, 008, and 012 (logging/validation violate coding guide).

request: Create user story for module-based CLI interface (python -m src.ui.cli --context context.md)
action: Created story 015 (Module-Based CLI Interface) with 5 story points. Analyzed project structure, identified refactoring needs for agent.py, defined 6 acceptance criteria covering module invocation, file arguments, help system, and non-interactive execution. Recommended as Must Have for Sprint 2. Story includes technical architecture for src/ui/ package structure and exit code strategy.
